contents.text: Thank you for calling EQ Recruiting, San Francisco’s recruiting agency focused on emotional intelligence, culture fit, and genuine connections.
If you are a candidate seeking your next opportunity, press 1.
To submit your resume and receive tailored job matches, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our candidate relations team.

navigationGoals: Send my resume for tailored job opportunities.
Send my resume to get matched with veteran-friendly job openings
Upload my resume to receive AI-driven job matches from EQ Recruiting.
I need help submitting my resume so I can get matched with suitable job openings.
Upload my CV to get matched with physics research or internship opportunities

contents.text: To book an interview coaching session with our experts, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to an interview coach.

navigationGoals: Book an interview coaching session.
Book an interview coaching session to improve my interview skills
Schedule an advanced interview coaching session with EQ Recruiting’s expert team.
I want to schedule an interview coaching session to prepare for job interviews.
Schedule an interview coaching session to prepare for upcoming physics internship interviews

contents.text: If you are a company looking to hire top talent, press 2.
To post a new job opening and find your ideal candidates, press 1.
Please hold while we link you to our employer services specialist.

navigationGoals: Post a new job listing to attract ideal candidates.
Post a new job opening for my veteran-owned small business
Post a new job opening with detailed role requirements to attract top candidates.
I’d like to post a new job opening to attract qualified candidates.
Post a job listing for a physics lab assistant role to attract suitable candidates

contents.text: To arrange a consultation about your recruitment needs, press 2.
One moment please while we forward your call to our hiring consultant.

navigationGoals: Schedule a consultation on our recruitment needs.
Arrange a consultation with a recruiter about hiring for my company
Arrange a strategic consultation to optimize our company’s talent acquisition pipeline.
I’m looking to speak with a consultant about my company’s hiring needs.
Set up a consultation to discuss recruiting physics students for my research team
